reviewText: Great DVD for individual improvement, can also modify drills to be use in team practices. Being in European format obviously has it's inconveniences , but once you download it to your laptop  it becomes accessible and convenient to take to backyard or park for training sessions..Cant beat the price!!!

DVD will not play on US DVD or Blue Ray players.  I was able to watch by playing on my notebook computer.  Great DVD, just wish I could have enjoyed on a larger screen without having to go through the trouble of converting.
This video is full of great tips and perfect for little ones to work on their skills. We love it.
Dvd was not described as being european format  so i had it converted . OInce converted it is a great resourse for players and coaches
